casino.cashier

Interface IGamblerCard

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GamblerCard

    public interface IGamblerCard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BetID generateNewBetID()
      The card generates a unique betID for every bet made by the gambler on the machine.
      MoneyAmount getBalance() 
      CardID getCardID() 
      int getNumberOfBetIDs()
      return number of betID's generated on this card.
      java.util.Set<BetID> returnBetIDs()
      returns all generated betID's by this card
      java.util.Set<BetID> returnBetIDsAndClearCard()
      returns all generated betID's by this card, and clears all betID's from the card.

    • Method Detail

      • returnBetIDs

        java.util.Set<BetID> returnBetIDs()
        returns all generated betID's by this card
        Returns:
        a copied set of betID's generated by this card.

      • returnBetIDsAndClearCard

        java.util.Set<BetID> returnBetIDsAndClearCard()
        returns all generated betID's by this card, and clears all betID's from the card.
        Returns:
        a copied set of betID's generated by this card.

      • generateNewBetID

        BetID generateNewBetID()
        The card generates a unique betID for every bet made by the gambler on the machine. A list of all generated betID’s is also stored on the card. BetID’s also contain a timestamp.
        Returns:

      • getNumberOfBetIDs

        return number of betID's generated on this card.
